Html5 global attributes are available under com.webfirmframework.wffweb.tag.html.html5.attribute.global package.

Package com.webfirmframework.wffweb.tag.html.attribute.global Description

Global html attributes :
accesskey
class
id
lang
style - http://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css3_pr_align-content.asp
tabindex
title
Html5 global attributes are available under com.webfirmframework.wffweb.tag.html.html5.attribute.global package. visit http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_standardattributes.asp or https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes
